Exultation is the going
Of an inland soul to sea
Past the houses, past the headlands,
Into deep eternity!
Bred as we, among the mountains,
Can the sailor understand
The divine intoxication
Of the first league out from land?

note: Techie, foodie, pilot, writer. Not necessarily in that order. Used to do politics. Now doing environmental data analysis. Founder at @ecosophy .
Maps, statistics, guitars, land rovers, photography.
Techdirt guy. I once wrote a paper about "Protocols, not Platforms" that seems to be slightly relevant. Also can follow my Bluesky posts at @mmasnick.bsky.social
